page.title: 21Hucknall Regenerated
page.content:
The Hucknall Tourism and Regeneration Group is a group of residents, business owners, volunteer workers and district councillors. Their aim is to help Hucknall attract visitors to the town, improve its economy, and raise awareness of its heritage to all. HTRG has produced a series of Heritage Trail leaflets; they staff a Visitor Information Point within Hucknall Library, and they lead very popular, free guided bus tours throughout the Spring and Summer months. There is also a website.
David Heathcote
